name: In The Dark (itch) (SuperGoodName)
description:
Relative Description:

In The Dark, a game that requires you to sneak around while avoiding guards. You a creature that has been stuck in this location for centuries as adapted entirely to the dark and will be blinded if you step into any light. Humans are trying to turn back on the lights which would ruin your kind. The Enemies have powerful weapons that will take you out in one hit if they see you. 

  

Controls:

Walk Left - A

Walk Right - D

Jump - Space (Press Twice Quickly to Double Jump)

Hide (Must Be Standing By An Obstacle Or Wall To Hide) - Ctrl

Sprint - Shift

Attack(Must Be Standing Behind An Enemy To Work/ Does Work Relatively Far Away) - F

Zoom Out To See Map - M
